propertyTemplates.remark: Text field to indicate the Accession Number.

An ARM Status Vocabulary exists that has not yet been requested as a lookup. Leaving it as a literal by now, with the recommendation to use the ARM vocabulary term (https://ld4p.github.io/arm/core/vocabularies/status/0.1/status.html).

resourceTemplates.author: Paloma Graciani (paloma.graciani@austin.utexas.edu)
resourceTemplates.remark: Numeric, alphanumeric, or other identifying codes assigned when an art object, book, or other item enters the collection of a museum, library, or other repository. Such codes are unique within the set of codes, and specifically identify the particular item at hand. The numbers may be marked on the objects or not.

resourceTemplates.author: Paloma Graciani (paloma.graciani@austin.utexas.edu)
resourceTemplates.remark: Item identifier, such as a call or other type of number

Profile.description: Profile to define RTs for identifiers to be used in rare materials items at the HRC
Profile.author: Paloma Graciani (paloma.graciani@austin.utexas.edu)
Profile.title: HRC Identifiers Profile
